entry.source: This job is from Q the blacksmith. According{F801}to a book called the "Taketori Monogatari" that{F801}is passed among the Casualries, a rat pelt{F801}surrounded by flames is extremely valuable.{F801}If you can get some, please bring it to him{F801}so he can create the {F804,5}Fireguard{F804,0} armor.{F801}
